NavigatorGetBattery.summary:
The getBattery() method provides information about the system's battery.
It returns a battery promise, which is resolved in a object providing also some new events you can handle to monitor the battery status.
This implements the Battery Status API; see that documentation for additional details, a guide to using the API, and sample code.

blockquote.para: Note: Access to this feature may be controlled by the Permissions-Policy directive Permissions-Policy/battery.

NavigatorGetBattery.returns: A {{JSxRef("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object which you can use to get information about the battery's state.
